experience.subtitle: My diverse career journey across talent development, marketing, and customer service, showcasing adaptability and cross-disciplinary skills.

jobs.description: Connecting international talent with Japan's job market while providing comprehensive career counseling for students and professionals.
responsibilities: Provide career counseling and guidance for international students seeking employment in Japan
Develop relationships with companies looking to hire international talent
Organize career development workshops and networking events
Offer cultural integration training for both employers and job seekers
